name: Rediscover [ALPHA]
description:
This game is very early in development!

_________________________________
 Current Version: Auspice 1
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
Auspice is the first major public build of the game.  There's not much to do, but you can walk around, rub against walls, and mess with the inventory screen.

You can report any bugs you find directly to me via Twitter @mazzymuse

MacOS is not yet supported, but Wine should work

________________________
 Controls: Keyboard
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
WASD/arrows to move
Enter/Escape to pause
IJKL/ShiftZXC/Space to select

________________________
 Controls: Gamepad
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
D-pad to move
Start to pause
A/B/X/Y to select

Follow development on Twitter!
https://twitter.com/mazzymuse
